ygData.subject: Look back on First posts

Subject: Look back on First posts
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

I'd just like to say that this RPG is moving forward marvelously.  But I 
would like to look back on the 'old days'.  Whenever someone new comes, they 
have a bumpy start.  I'll you that even the council has had days when they 
made bad plots or moded.  No offense to everyone here of course.  I say we 
all tell what happened on our very first post so we can laugh at eachother 
and ourselves.  How about it?  I'll start:

::Torca burst into the room and pointed his dorsal gun at Quickstrike, trying 
to extinguish his spark::

:-)
